title: AWS re:Invent 2025-How enterprises are deploying PolyAI's voice agents at scale to reduce handling..
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 企业如何大规模部署 PolyAI 的语音代理以减少处理...
abstract: Discover how PolyAI and AWS are redefining customer experience through generative voice AI. Learn how global enterprises are deploying natural-sounding, resilient voice assistants that run securely and at scale on AWS infrastructure. Join Michael Chen, VP of Strategic Alliances for insights, architecture highlights, and real-world customer success stories.
abstract_cn: 了解 PolyAI 和 AWS 如何通过生成式语音 AI 重新定义客户体验。了解全球企业如何在 AWS 基础设施上安全且大规模地部署自然流畅、稳健可靠的语音助手。加入 Michael Chen（战略联盟副总裁）的分享，获取洞察、架构亮点和真实的客户成功案例。

presenter.name: Michael Chen
presenter.title: VP of Strategic Alliances & Corporate Development
